items.sentence: I don\'t think Tom and Mary have finished doing that.
Tom doesn\'t earn enough money to support his family.
There are still a lot of things that have to be done.
I haven\'t had a home-cooked meal since my wife died.
They killed Tom as an example to the other prisoners.
This bread is really delicious. Where did you buy it?
Tom abandoned his dream of becoming an oceanographer.
Let\'s continue working together to make that happen.
Tom told me he wouldn\'t be able to be here tomorrow.
How are we going to fit all of this stuff in the car?
